system.description:
Effect: All valid targets lose -2 EVA stages for 5 activations. All [Hazard] and [Shield] attack effects in the attack's range are cleared. Active Foggy or Heavy Foggy Weather is removed.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Corviknight and has a Flying-Type attack on their Active List.

actions.name: G-Max Wind Rage
